meanings.sent1: She moved cumbersomely through the crowded room.
meanings.sent2: He carried the heavy box cumbersomely up the stairs.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to play with the ball of yarn cumbersomely, getting tangled in it instead.
meanings.sent4: The old car chugged cumbersomely up the steep hill.
meanings.sent5: The toddler tried to put on his shoes cumbersomely, putting them on the wrong feet.

meanings.definition: In a way that is difficult to handle or manage.
meanings.sent1: She juggled cumbersomely with all the grocery bags.
meanings.sent2: The project was cumbersomely delayed due to unexpected issues.
meanings.sent3: The puppy tried to carry the big bone cumbersomely, dragging it across the floor.
meanings.sent4: The politician tried to navigate cumbersomely through the controversial topic.
meanings.sent5: The student tried to balance all the books cumbersomely in his arms, almost dropping them.
